attributes.action: Ban the trade of primates in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Primates accross the world are being captured and sold with many being exploited and abused by people who do not know how to care for them.  Banning the trade of all primates in the United Kingdom will go towards stopping this accross the entire world and may give some of those threatened with extinction the chance to breed unharmed.
